name: Starbucks Classic Logo Mug
description: The iconic Starbucks ceramic mug featuring the classic green Siren logo. Perfect for your morning coffee ritual.

name: Pike Place Roast Mug
description: Inspired by our Pike Place Roast blend, this mug captures the spirit of Seattle with warm earth tones and a comfortable handle.

name: Holiday Collection Mug
description: Limited edition holiday mug featuring festive red and green designs. A collectible piece for the holiday season.

name: Reserve Roastery Mug
description: Premium ceramic mug from our Reserve Roastery collection. Features artisan details and a generous 16oz capacity.

name: City Series Seattle Mug
description: Celebrate the birthplace of Starbucks with this Seattle-themed mug featuring the iconic skyline and Space Needle.

name: Siren's Tale Mug
description: An artistic mug featuring an illustrated story of the Starbucks Siren. A conversation piece for coffee enthusiasts.
